item.title: 户外可穿戴设备需求强劲，Garmin 预测 2025 年业绩高于预期
item.description: 瑞士导航设备制造商 Garmin 周三预计全年业绩将高于华尔街预期，主要得益于其户外和汽车 OEM 业务的持续增长。【原文：Swiss navigation device maker Garmin forecast full-year results above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, banking on continued momentum in its outdoor and auto OEM segments.】

item.title: 西南航空转型负责人瑞安-格林将卸任
item.description: 在西南航空公司与激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）达成协议数月后，该公司周三表示，其首席转型官瑞安-格林（Ryan Green）将卸任。【原文：Southwest Airlines said on Wednesday its chief transformation officer, Ryan Green, will step down from his role, months after the carrier reached an agreement with activist investor Elliott Investment Management.】

item.title: 电动卡车制造商尼古拉申请破产保护
item.description: 尼古拉公司周三表示，该公司已申请破产保护，并将寻求出售全部或大部分资产，在过去几个季度中，该公司一直在努力解决现金快速消耗和融资困难的问题。【原文：Nikola said on Wednesday it had filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection and would pursue a sale of all or most of its assets, after grappling with rapid cash burn and struggling to raise funds in the past few quarters.】

item.title: Etsy 节假日季度销售额不及预期，股价下跌
item.description: 受礼品和手工艺品消费疲软的影响，Etsy 的假日季度营收和商品销售总额均未达到华尔街预期，导致该在线市场股价在周三盘前交易中下跌 8%。【原文：Etsy missed Wall Street estimates for holiday-quarter revenue and gross merchandise sales, hurt by weak spending on gifts and handcrafted goods, sending shares of the online marketplace down 8% in premarket trading on Wednesday.】

item.title: Coach 母公司 Tapestry 将以 1.05 亿美元出售 Stuart Weitzman 鞋类品牌
item.description: Coach 母公司 Tapestry 周三表示，将以 1.05 亿美元现金将 Stuart Weitzman 品牌出售给 Dr Scholl's 鞋类所有者 Caleres。【原文：Coach parent Tapestry will sell the Stuart Weitzman brand to Dr Scholl's footwear owner Caleres for $105 million in cash, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道：Vanguard 因新的 ESG 指南而暂停公司会议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，顶级共同基金管理公司先锋（Vanguard）在审查美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）关于投资者激进主义的新指导意见的影响时，暂停了与投资组合公司的会面。【原文：Top mutual fund manager Vanguard has paused meetings with portfolio companies while it reviews the impact of new guidance on investor activism from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果公司将推出成本更低的新款 iPhone，以占领更广阔的市场
item.description: 苹果公司将于本周三推出其最新的廉价版 iPhone 机型，以抢占中端智能手机市场的更大份额，并抵御三星和中国华为等竞争对手的竞争。【原文：Apple is set to launch its latest budget iPhone model on Wednesday as it looks to grab a bigger share of the mid-range smartphone market and fend off competition from rivals such Samsung and China's Huawei.】

item.title: 预测疲软预示约会应用转机缓慢，Bumble 股价下滑
item.description: Bumble公司的股价周三下跌了16%，因为这家约会应用运营商预计第一季度的营收低于市场预期，该公司仍在努力应对付费用户增长放缓的问题。【原文：Bumble's shares fell 16% on Wednesday after the dating app operator forecast first-quarter revenue below market estimates, as it continues to grapple with a slowdown in the growth of paying users.】

item.title: 苹果称英国监管机构对移动浏览器的补救方案将打击创新
item.description: 苹果公司告诉英国竞争监管机构，该监管机构为解决移动浏览器市场问题而提出的一些补救方案将影响这家 iPhone 制造商的创新动力。【原文：Apple has told Britain's competition regulator that some of the remedy options proposed by the watchdog to address concerns in the mobile browser market would impact the iPhone maker's incentive to innovate.】

item.title: 早间竞价落后的美国仍在徘徊新高
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 脂肪而非肌肉：制药商竞相寻求下一个减肥突破
item.description: 目前的减肥方法，如改变生活方式、手术以及诺和诺德公司的 Wegovy 和礼来公司的 Zepbound 等流行疗法，都会导致脂肪和肌肉流失，从而增加跌倒的风险并降低整体力量，这对老年患者尤其有害。【原文：Current weight-loss methods such as lifestyle changes, surgery, and popular therapies like Novo Nordisk's Wegovy and Eli Lilly's Zepbound result in both fat and muscle loss that can increase the risk of falls and decrease overall strength, which could be especially harmful for older patients.】

item.title: 聚焦：新一代减肥药旨在拯救肌肉
item.description: 约有十几家制药商正在开发旨在保护肌肉的新型减肥疗法，行业分析师、临床试验专家和医生表示，要想获得批准，这些疗法可能还需要证明除体重秤上的数字外，还能带来更多的健康益处。【原文：About a dozen drugmakers are developing new weight-loss treatments aimed at preserving muscle, and industry analysts, clinical trial experts and doctors say they may also need to demonstrate additional health benefits beyond the numbers on a scale to get approved.】

item.title: 沃尔玛面临关税挑战，华尔街等待破纪录的销售业绩
item.description: 沃尔玛高管表示，沃尔玛购物者更注重的是获得最低价格，而不是产品是在美国、加拿大、中国还是其他地方生产的。【原文：Penny-pinching Walmart shoppers focus much more on getting the lowest prices than on whether products are made in the U.S., Canada, China or elsewhere, Walmart executives have said.】

item.title: 关税威胁日益加剧，美联储担忧加剧
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会官员仍不确定关税可能对通胀产生的影响，但随着特朗普政府征收进口税计划的范围变得越来越清晰，他们已开始概述对供应链、公众预期和最终价格造成的更严重风险。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve officials remain uncertain about the impact tariffs might have on inflation, but have begun outlining more serious risks to supply chains, public expectations and ultimately prices as the scope of the Trump administration's plans for import taxes has become clearer.】

item.title: 在马德里的美国公司要求特朗普区别对待西班牙
item.description: 一批在西班牙的美国公司要求唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府在对其商品征收新关税时考虑到西班牙对美国的贸易逆差。【原文：A group of U.S. companies present in Spain asked the administration of President Donald Trump to take into account the country's trade deficit with the United States when setting new tariffs on its goods.】

item.title: 市场权衡特朗普的汽车关税威胁，美联储会议纪要即将公布，期货市场步履维艰
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货基本持平，因为投资者正在评估唐纳德-特朗普总统最新的关税威胁，并等待美联储预计在当天晚些时候公布的1月份会议纪要。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were largely flat on Wednesday as investors evaluated President Donald Trump's latest tariff threats and awaited minutes of the Federal Reserve's January meeting, expected later in the day.】

item.title: 与习近平会晤后，中国企业创新者表示将抵御外部压力
item.description: 在国家主席习近平与私营部门举行了罕见的会晤之后，包括汽车制造商比亚迪和小米公司负责人在内的一些中国著名商界领袖表示，他们将顶住外部压力，继续创新。【原文：Some of China's prominent business leaders, including the heads of carmakers BYD and Xiaomi , said they would resist external pressure and keep innovating, following a rare meeting between President Xi Jinping and the private sector.】

item.title: 蚂蚁金服集团进军中国日益壮大的仿人机器人产业，科技兴趣与日俱增
item.description: 与阿里巴巴有关联的金融科技巨头蚂蚁金服集团正在涉足仿人机器人行业，加入了越来越多探索这一新兴领域的中国大型科技公司的行列。【原文：Ant Group, the Alibaba-linked fintech giant, is venturing into the humanoid robot industry, joining a growing list of major Chinese tech companies exploring this emerging field.】

item.title: 阿提哈德航空首次公开募股前利润增长两倍多，达到近 5 亿美元
item.description: 阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways）周三表示，随着该公司推进首次公开募股（IPO）计划，其去年的净利润增长了两倍多，达到 4.76 亿美元。【原文：Etihad Airways' net profit more than tripled last year to $476 million, the company said on Wednesday as the carrier pushes ahead with plans for an initial public offering (IPO).】

item.title: 股市维持在纪录高位附近，摆脱特朗普最新关税政策的影响
item.description: 周三，全球股市在纪录高点附近持稳，交易员们谨慎地回避了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对汽车、半导体和药品进口征收关税的最新威胁。【原文：Global stocks held steady around record highs on Wednesday, as traders cautiously shrugged off U.S President Donald Trump's latest tariff threats on auto, semiconductor and pharmaceutical imports.】

item.title: 对冲基金为中国量身定制双赢赌注
item.description: 如果中国政府与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）达成协议，或者如果世界其他国家和中国联合起来反对这位美国总统，热衷于应对中美贸易紧张局势的全球对冲基金正在囤积中国股票赌注，希望从中牟取暴利。【原文：Global hedge funds keen to navigate U.S.-China trade tensions are amassing Chinese stock bets in the hopes of making huge profits if Beijing forms a pact with Donald Trump, or if the rest of the world and China unite against the U.S. president.】

item.title: 汇丰放弃 2030 年净零排放目标
item.description: 汇丰银行（HSBC）周三表示，由于实体经济变化缓慢，该行将放弃到2030年实现所有业务碳净零排放的目标。【原文：HSBC is ditching its target of reaching net-zero carbon emissions across its business by 2030 because of slow change in the real economy, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国最高金融监管机构承诺稳定民营企业信贷供应
item.description: 周三的一份官方声明显示，中国最高金融监管机构誓言将保持对民营企业稳定有效的信贷供应，并将加大对民营企业贷款的支持力度。【原文：China's top financial regulator vowed it will maintain stable and effective credit supply to private firms and will step up support for their loans, an official statement showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 谷歌同意支付 3.26 亿欧元了结意大利税务案
item.description: 米兰检察官周三表示，在谷歌爱尔兰有限公司同意支付3.26亿欧元（约合3.4亿美元）税款后，他们已要求撤销对该公司的起诉。【原文：Milan's prosecutors said on Wednesday they had asked to drop a case against Google Ireland Ltd after the company agreed to pay 326 million euros ($340 million) over a tax claim.】

item.title: 土耳其媒体报道：泽连斯基称美国矿产提案有待完善
item.description: 周三有报道援引沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基总统的话说，美国提出的一项重要矿产交易提案不公平，因为其中不包括安全保障，他不希望乌克兰成为原材料枢纽。【原文：President Volodymyr Zelenskiy was quoted on Wednesday as saying a U.S. proposal for a critical minerals deal was unfair as it did not include security guarantees, and he did not want Ukraine to become a hub for raw materials.】

item.title: 平衡风险与回报，中国 2 月贷款利率将保持不变
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，预计中国将在周四维持基准贷款利率不变，因为在北京面临新的贸易紧张局势之际，中国政府将在优先考虑金融稳定和提供更多刺激措施之间徘徊。【原文：China is expected to leave its benchmark lending rates unchanged on Thursday, a Reuters poll showed, as authorities walk a fine line between prioritising financial stability and providing more stimulus at a time when Beijing is facing fresh trade tensions.】

item.title: 因美元走强，MTU 航空发动机公司上调 2025 年展望
item.description: 德国发动机制造商 MTU 航空发动机公司（MTU Aero Engines）周三上调了 2025 年的收入预期，其依据是欧元对美元的汇率降低。【原文：German engine manufacturer MTU Aero Engines raised its revenue guidance for 2025 on Wednesday, based on a lower assumed exchange rate of the euro versus the U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 古兹曼、威斯法默将为澳大利亚自由零售商带来乐观收益
item.description: 投资者表示，由于通胀缓解和减税政策鼓励疲惫的消费者重新开始消费，澳大利亚的自由支配零售商预计将公布更好的半年盈利报告。【原文：Australia's discretionary retailers are expected to report improved half-yearly earnings, investors said, as easing inflation and tax cuts encouraged weary consumers to start spending again.】

item.title: 研究称，2025 年美国投资者将在欧洲引领激进主义风潮
item.description: 一项研究周三称，随着美国公司越来越多地参与收购公司以向其管理层施压，预计激进投资者今年将在欧洲各地加大行动力度。【原文：Activist investors are expected to step up their campaigns across Europe this year, with American firms increasingly involved buying into companies to put pressure on their management, a study said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 高盛认为乌克兰停火不会提高俄罗斯产量
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）周三表示，潜在的乌克兰停火以及与之相关的对俄罗斯制裁的放松不太可能大幅增加俄罗斯的石油流量。【原文：A potential Ukraine ceasefire and the associated easing in sanctions on Russia are unlikely to substantially increase Russia's oil flows, Goldman Sachs said on Wednesday.】
